name: Hand Full of Heads
description:
Visit Hand Full of Heads at Levi D. Smith Games

It's a hand full of heads! Add more heads by clicking!

Inspired by Conway's Game of Life.  If a head is too far away from other heads, it will turn blue and move slowly.  If a head bumps into another head, it will become angry, turn red, and move quickly for a brief period of time.
